resources.string: No apps installed. \n \nThere are apps on your device, but they are not available from pretix Marketplace Client. This could be because you need to update your repositories, or the repositories genuinely don\'t have your apps available.
pretix Marketplace Client is ready to swap
Apps installed by pretix Marketplace Client as CSV file
pretix Marketplace Client needs the storage permission to install this to storage. Please allow it on the next screen to proceed with installation.
